titles.title: Scrap the MAP Act
To amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to repeal the Market Access Program of the Department of Agriculture.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 2/24/2010--Introduced. Scrap the MAP Act - Amends the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to repeal the Market Access Program (MAP) of the Department of Agriculture (USDA). (MAP is a program that uses funds from the USDA's Commodity Credit Corporation [CCC] to aid in the creation, expansion, and maintenance of foreign markets for U.S. agricultural products.)
